scripts.bump-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump patch version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && echo "âœ… Patch version bumped to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
scripts.bump-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump minor version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && echo "âœ… Minor version bumped to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
scripts.bump-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump major version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && echo "âœ… Major version bumped to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
scripts.release: VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag v$VERSION && git push && git push --tags && gh release create v$VERSION --title "Release v$VERSION" --notes "Automated release v$VERSION" && echo "ğŸš€ Released v$VERSION - GitHub Actions will publish to NPM"
